website_summaries.verdict: Perfect choice when you don't need frills but want a clean scent that's good for the budget.
pros: These 2-pack soy, vegetable, and cottonseed wax candles have fresh garden scents like geranium or basil, which burn evenly for 35 hours
cons: Some felt that the lavender scent was not natural

customer_reviews.title: Wedding day candles smelled so yummy!
customer_reviews.text: I had both of these burning all day in my house the day of my wedding. We had 150 guests in our home and back yard. These candles smell so great that guests were commenting how good the house smelled. I needed them because we have two old stinky dogs and I needed something that smelled stronger than they do! I have been a loyal Mrs. Meyers fan for years. I like that they burn cleanly, have a super long burn time (lots of bang for your buck!), do not smoke, and don't bother my asthma. I will always remember my happy wedding day when I smell this scent!
customer_reviews.author: Rose Blossom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing natural scent.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfully scented candle that burns clean and fills the room. It smells just like walking by freshly bloomed flowers. Removing 1 star because as others mentioned there’s still quite a bit of wax left once the wick burns out. However I just melt it down and use it in my wax warmer. It’s a great way to extend the life of the candle. For what it’s worth, I am replacing my expensive yankee candle habit with these. They have a lower burn time dollar for dollar but make it up for in the pleasantly powerful scent throwing. I find I burn these for less hours overall, so worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Rose Geranium
customer_reviews.text: Loves! I got one of these on clearance at Target and it made such an impression I had to order more online. I imagine they mean Rose Geranium scent since regular geraniums kind of stink. Very clean "real" scent. Seems like the kind of thing that could be used by someone who is typically sensitive to or get headaches from candles.
customer_reviews.author: Jewels Mc

customer_reviews.title: Waste of wax and money!
customer_reviews.text: This candle smells nice, but not any better than most others. And the scent doesn’t last, nor does it fill a room. Worst of all, though, is that there is a significant amount of candle left when it stops lighting (see photos). The jar isn’t filled to the top anyway, and then for it to stop with so much left over just makes this candle a big waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie W

customer_reviews.title: If your'e unfamiliar with dog pee it is literally the worst. I light one of these candles and in ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper online than if you bought them in a store. I have a pug who decided he likes to pee in the house while I'm at work. If your'e unfamiliar with dog pee it is literally the worst. I light one of these candles and in less than 4 minutes my house goes from smelling like a dog shelter to a spa! They can burn for a super long long time! DO IT
customer_reviews.author: angelina

customer_reviews.title: MRS MEYERS is my "go to" products these days!
customer_reviews.text: WOW, the scent throw on these is phenomenal! In fact, I can't leave it going for a very long time because for me it becomes overpowering, but I like that because when I snuff it out the scent lingers for a long time and I am not burning the candle unnecessarily for long periods of time! This, of course, means I will have the candle for a considerable length of time, VERY please with this MRS MEYERS purchase as I am with ALL of these products, they are my new "go to" cleaning, bathing and laundering products!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela K.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with a clean, natural, crisp scent that is not overwhelming.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why these aren't rated higher, especially compared with prices of comparable items. I've been using these candles for years and always have them on hand. I have a small home and two dogs and cook their food (gross stuff) for them and always light one up while I'm cooking or if I walk in the house and it smells a little off. I've never had anyone say the house smells bad and I always ask for honest feedback. It's a clean, clear crisp scent and it doesn't bother animals like scented candles do. Also, I use a few of Mrs. Meyer's cleaning products and am very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: GET

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I kind of love the scent of candles and I was never a big candle person. I do wish they were a bit more affordable but they do do the job. Unfortunately after it burns there still an amount that remains that doesn't allow it to burn that I feel is something wrong with the product consistently.
customer_reviews.author: Shaz

customer_reviews.title: Knock off
customer_reviews.text: I suspected these were knock offs when the scent didn’t seem quite right. They weren’t unpleasant but fainter and not what I was looking for. I got an authentic one through Whole Foods on Amazon Prime delivery and the difference was obvious. Honestly these aren’t terrible but I wanted that particular Clean Day scent and it bothers me that these are trying to pass something off as a product they’re not.
customer_reviews.author: Canfam

customer_reviews.title: Great scent. Long lasting candles.
customer_reviews.text: The smell is amazing. I love that the candles are soy so nothing toxic is being released into the room. There is no black soot or smoke. The screw top lid makes moving around easier as well as keeping dust from falling inside. The Geranium Rose scent smells clean, fresh and relaxing. Loving this candle. I like that I can repurpose the glass jar afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: L O V E
customer_reviews.text: I love this smell. So clean and fresh!! The two pack is great because i can have them lit in 2 room and the smell goes throughout the house. I don’t get headaches from the smell and it’s not overpowering, just super fresh and floral. The only thing i notice is the candle has trouble burning the outside ring of wax. I knocked some of it into the hot wax to try to evenly burn. Not a huge deal just something to note!
customer_reviews.author: Madison C

customer_reviews.title: Fills home with fragrance that lasts..
customer_reviews.text: Geranium fragrance to floral for me.. Allergies were triggered be this version. The lavender does not do that. These burn many hours. Keep wick trimmed to get the most use. Only real complaint is the amount of wax that does not burn but it can be spooned out and fed into another candle so it is consumed. The jar is reusable and easy to clean up with hot water and soap.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok scent
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought this didn’t have a good smell at all when you first light it but give it time. Once it gets going it really fills the house with a very pleasant smell. I keep this burning when I have guests coming over and always get compliments on how nice the house smells. And that’s a good thing I have a dog and am always worrying about smells in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Geraniums Galore!
customer_reviews.text: I just love the geranium candles! The scent is comparable to fresh roses. I can’t attest to burn time, as I haven’t had them long enough to give an honest opinion on that, but both candles arrived in perfect condition and as scheduled. I am now a Mrs Meyers junkie for sure! Even when the candles aren’t lit, the scent still fills the room but not overwhelmingly.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa T

customer_reviews.title: The wicks are cheap
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice scent & I like that it’s not overpowering, but the candle burns BADLY because the wicks used are so cheap. The candles burn out much more quickly than they would if there were higher quality wicks being used. They’re only half as good as they could be, sadly wasteful, don’t last long at all. It’s like they have birthday candle wicks in them.
customer_reviews.author: MsL

customer_reviews.title: Not a Powerful Scent
customer_reviews.text: These candles smell amazing, but I have to be next to or right near the candle to capture the scent. I was expecting my whole house to be filled with this magical scent, but it’s not that powerful. They do have a great burning time, but I haven’t used up all of mine yet. I’d say some of the candles I get from Target for $10 have a more potent smell and they are much larger.
customer_reviews.author: Ashton S.

customer_reviews.title: Soy amazing
customer_reviews.text: I already trust the brand so when I decide make the switch from scented oils I began my search. I first tried a target brand which smelled great but it would burn quickly. I decided to pay a little more And boy was it worth it. Hours upon hours of burn time and the scent last for hours after the candle has been blown out. These are officially a reoccurring purchase
customer_reviews.author: shoe goddess

customer_reviews.title: So much unused wax....
customer_reviews.text: I understand some of the reviews about wasted candle... the smell is great but the wick burns straight down and leaves a ton of unused wax around the inner rim of the candle... I mean A LOT! I wouldn’t buy again only because of that it feels like you could’ve got three other candle usages out of the wasted wax.
customer_reviews.author: Robee Pilgrim

customer_reviews.title: Yeah...sorry, I don’t like any of the scents
customer_reviews.text: I know a lot of people seem to like these candles but they just were not great for me. I love candles and I have tried them all and when I saw good reviews on this brand and with such a good price, I had to try them so I bought all 4 scents. Well, to say the least, I was very disappointed. Terrible throw and what you do smell, smells awful. Geranium is better than the rest but given the scent doesn’t carry, I will not buy these again. My whole family said a collective “ewww!” when I lit them. I recommend bath&bodyworks candles especially when they go on sale
customer_reviews.author: ChasingHappy360

customer_reviews.title: They smell like heaven on earth!
customer_reviews.text: These candles smell like heaven on earth. I'm halfway through the second one and I will definitely be buying more. To me, the smell is almost like a mixture of lilacs and roses / my two favorite scents in the entire world. Wonderful quality, too. Id give 10 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Tabetha CB

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent, and love that I was able to get two and save money!
customer_reviews.text: The scent is wonderful and I love how long these candles last. I'm a big candle burning, it's part of my attempt to "relax." I burn them a lot and these hang around for quite awhile. I keep buying Mrs. Meyer, but trying different scents.
customer_reviews.author: Socalgal428

customer_reviews.title: Yuck!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was getting a Geranium scented candle?!? This smells like a VERY STRONG laundry - it's clean! But holy crap I can take it for only about 5 minutes and then it's just nauseating. I'm so disappointed ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Becca.

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could love these, but they tunnel like crazy. For the first burn, I left them going for hours -- and they started tunneling anyway. Additionally, while I appreciate that these are more affordable "clean" candles, I wish their scents were a little more adventurous. One note candles that don't burn very well don't justify even a grocery store price point.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Only Burns half of wax
customer_reviews.text: Had a very pleasant smell. But after a couple days of burning, candle wick will no longer lit, while just below half full still. Read great reviews and was hoping for more. However I will be moving on and looking for a different every day candle.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: They are what they are
customer_reviews.text: For a "healthy" alternative to wick candles, these soy candles have a good smell and relatively long life. The scent of course gets dull the more you use them, but for every day use these candles do very well.
customer_reviews.author: ILikeBubbleTea

customer_reviews.title: geranium -- very nice soft scent
customer_reviews.text: love the geranium scent. fills the room. I also keep some of the jars, as the soy candle remains come out easily. I can use jars for storing various things. I'm giving this 4 stars because they really don't last long. A few evenings, a few hours. that's it. So I watch when are "add on item" and get then.
customer_reviews.author: R BTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfy
customer_reviews.text: I put this candle in a small area and he brought me nausea and headache, is the first time ever a candle made me feel this way I hope has no chemicals in it! And too much of the candle wasted, not burned until the end. Not buying again
customer_reviews.author: zaklin s

customer_reviews.title: Great Smell, love this brand
customer_reviews.text: I got these on an amazon deal, 50% off! that made this deal even sweeter. I already loved Mrs. Meyers brand but hadn't tried her candles yet. They smell so good and quickly fill my house with a lovely floral scent. They burn slow because they are soy also.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Elliott-Wiley

customer_reviews.title: superb candle but lack packaging for glass
customer_reviews.text: The best cleaning candle I've ever had. This beats all the big branded candles that sell chemical mediocre scent. This is the basic candle with subtle hint of scent that freshen the mind and the room Totally recommend it. -1star for the packaging though.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Lam

customer_reviews.title: Great candles broken glass in box when opened box
customer_reviews.text: The best candles in all scents. This order contained two candles. One was cracked. Quite a lot. Boxed well wrapped well but was cracked Lately due to the overwhelming orders my orders are extremely late on all my order. Considering paying for prime does not matter
customer_reviews.author: Janie Adams

customer_reviews.title: Intense floral
customer_reviews.text: The smell is really strong. Which is great for those that want a really floral scent. But I have a really sensitive nose and allergies and this product was a little too intense for me
customer_reviews.author: Kata Kahlo

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: I mean, they're not the worst candles in the world but their scent is very strong. They lasted me about a month each which is pretty reasonable, but overall I would not purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Lang

customer_reviews.title: Great candles to freshen up the home
customer_reviews.text: I love these candles and this scent. My only gripe is that sometimes there's a little less than half an inch of wax that won't burn at the bottom because the wick is done.
customer_reviews.author: Jess C

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fresh scent
customer_reviews.text: Love this candle. Beautiful fresh scent that lasts for hours. Candle does not burn too quikly. Smells good even when not lit.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Garrone

customer_reviews.title: My favorite scent
customer_reviews.text: Geranium is my favorite scent from this candle. We burn a lot of candles at our place, and after going through so many of more expensive ones, we decided to give Mrs. Meyer's a try since they were less than what we had been using. The scent fills our apartment nicely and we don't feel bad letting burn for hours. It's a great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Spring Smell
customer_reviews.text: The scent is amazing, I live in a studio apartment and every time I walk in the scent is apparent. I have been burning them all day since we are quarantined. I bought this scent because we are quarantined and am kind of missing the spring flowers and scents. My only complaint is that the candle tunnels and a lot of wax is being wasted. I don’t have a warmer or another way of using the wasted wax.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely smell
customer_reviews.text: My sister in law had this scent in soap and I became OBSESSED with it! So excited to find it in candle form. Very fragrant: I have a large kitchen, dining, living room open concept and one candle makes the whole place smell lovely. Might be overpowering for smaller space. Candles last awhile with frequent use as well.
customer_reviews.author: Erin  Arbour

customer_reviews.title: Nice aroma
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent of these candles. I do wish they would burn down to the bottom. I will continue to buy them because they last and smell fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Troy D Porter

customer_reviews.title: Good product, lots of left over wax
customer_reviews.text: Love Mrs. Meyers products and scents. The only down side was there was a lot of wax left over once it got to the end of its wick. Which I saw in previous reviews, so it was expected. I put my candle in a pot with water and brought to a boil and transferred the melted wax to a wax warmer. So I’m not too mad. Great product otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten S

customer_reviews.title: Old lady-ish smell, doesn’t give off a very good throw
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the reviews I was very excited to get these candles however they don’t have a very strong throw. The smell is borderline old lady-ish. Only burned one and it did leave quite a bit on used in the bottom of the jar. I think I’ll stick with Yankee candle or bath and Bodyworks
customer_reviews.author: Dana L

customer_reviews.title: Always good!!
customer_reviews.text: These are always awesome. Both for myself and gifts. If you’re familiar with their products then you understand. If you’re not, it’s worth the risk. They’re wonderfully clean and fragrant candles. Love their other products, too.
customer_reviews.author: Z. W.

customer_reviews.title: Superb soy candles
customer_reviews.text: I use these in my office when I see clients. Lovely scent, long burn time, and nice to know no animal fat is used in these. I 100% love them.
customer_reviews.author: MlleZed

customer_reviews.title: I like this brand
customer_reviews.text: I like this brand. Not in love with the smell (more like a rose smell than anything else). But, hey, I'm ordering candles online. It arrived on time and intact.
customer_reviews.author: big mac

customer_reviews.title: Smells good, burns long
customer_reviews.text: They smelled great at first, but over time I felt like I didn't notice them as much. Maybe you just get sensitized to them? Either way, I use them for lighting in my bathroom and they last a pretty long time. Lasted me about 3 weeks each of regular use in the evening.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: A great value for the price. And the smell is fantastic. They arrived intact and flawless. Will most likely order again once these are through.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Use a candle warmer!
customer_reviews.text: These candles smell SO wonderful! Problem is, they burn very quickly - I think more quickly than they advertise. Buy these... BUT ALSO, buy a candle warmer! My candles have now been going for almost two months and fill the apartment will a wonderful smell. I think they’ll last a couple months more. Much better than the “36 hours burn time” the candles quote.
customer_reviews.author: WH

customer_reviews.title: Received completely smashed
customer_reviews.text: I love this candle, but my package was completely smashed. One candle survived (just the lid was broken), but the other was broken into a million pieces (which fell everywhere when I opened the package). The packaging did say "fragile" on it but it must have gone unnoticed.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: A winner !!!
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond satisfied with this candle. The smell fills up the entire room and also lasts for a long time. I love it !!
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Awesome candles!
customer_reviews.text: Great scent, great longevity, great value. I will be a returning customer.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Morales

customer_reviews.title: Great scent!
customer_reviews.text: These candles have a beautiful, delicate, floral scent, one which is powerful enough to enwrap but a small room. Make sure, on the first burning, to let the wax melt completely to the outer rim of the candle jar, to maximize the burn time. This takes a few hours, unless you have some sort of candle cover.
customer_reviews.author: Moo Cunningbeef

customer_reviews.title: Way too expensive and don’t last very long
customer_reviews.text: Expensive and do not last long. That’s a bad combination. I can’t and won’t purchase these anymore even though this is my favorite scent.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Reinhardt

customer_reviews.title: Amazing scents and long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful scents like gardenia in this long lasting candle make it a really good purchase. If you have it on for a bit the beautiful scent will disburse through the house. I love it. Recommended purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken. Like many of the reviewers here, mine too arrived with the glass shattered. The replacement arrived in one piece but the scent was very faint. I bought the exact same candle from a boutique store in my neighborhood and it smells way more fragrant. Not worth the $2 you save buying it on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Aba

customer_reviews.title: Short burn time
customer_reviews.text: I really like this candle, the smell is great, but the burn time is so short! I don't know if I'll repurchase...
customer_reviews.author: Mm

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Smells so good. Although these candles have such a rich scent they burn too quickly! I know they advertise as 24-36 hours but that is doubtful to me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great scent!
customer_reviews.text: I was not disappointed, the candles live up to what I expect from Mrs. Meyer's products.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L.

customer_reviews.title: Soy based candles are of higher quality and better for the lungs!
customer_reviews.text: I buy these for my parents as gifts. The “soy” based candles are much better for my Dad’s lungs, as he suffers from a respiratory ailment. Lovely fragrance and value.
customer_reviews.author: Alaska Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I love the fragrance. It is clean and fresh. It does take care of odors
customer_reviews.author: Sue B.

customer_reviews.title: Freshness Overload
customer_reviews.text: This scent is just right for making your home smell fresh. I will continue purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: holly

customer_reviews.title: SO DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the $$$$$$. There was absolutely no throw!!!!! Noone ever commented on the smell...you know why? Because there wasn't any!!!!!! Save your coins and buy elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Martina Love

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: These candles last a long time. The scent is fairly strong.
customer_reviews.author: Pumpkin

customer_reviews.title: Good smell
customer_reviews.text: Mild but nice, burns for dozens of hours if you trim the wick after each use. Good. Leaves a nice scent in the room for a couple hours afterwards
customer_reviews.author: Will C

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell of these!
customer_reviews.text: First Mrs. Meyers product I have tried and I love them. The scent is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Best candles!
customer_reviews.text: Love this smell and burn time... would love bigger candles!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Denton

customer_reviews.title: Great scent
customer_reviews.text: Use these in bathroom. A bit pricey but worth it if used sparingly.
customer_reviews.author: E.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great fragrance
customer_reviews.text: I love the fragrance. The only issue I have is that the candle burns down and leaves about a quarter inch of wax in the bottom that won’t burn this is unlike other candles I purchase. I love mrs Meyers products but am somewhat disappointed with the candles.
customer_reviews.author: bonnie drewry

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend! The scent quality is pretty amazing with a great price. Normally you have throw done some money for a strong scented candle. Smells like a flower shop in the house 🥰
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Umm, Geranium!
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly balanced scent in the geranium option for these delightful and long-lasting candles.
customer_reviews.author: Montague Catway

customer_reviews.title: Good products. Love Mrs. Meyers stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great candles. Ice scent, but a bit too strong for my small space
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Bates

customer_reviews.title: Scent way way too light
customer_reviews.text: Loves Mrs Meyers products but these are not really fragrance full
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Calming scent
customer_reviews.text: The geranium scent of Meyer's candles is very relaxing and calming. I'm in to aromatherapy
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Wheatley

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Do not recommend. The scent of the candles are ok but the burn time is terrible and I have like half the candle left with wax that wouldn’t burn. There is so much wax left it’s pointless to buy these candles you’re better going to dollar tree for the quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Smells wonderful , wish they weren’t as expensive for their size but I continue to buy them because they smell so good and helps keep the “clean” smell.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: The candles scent is nice, but nothing impressive. For a little candle, the scent does carry pretty far. The candle doesn't seem to burn evenly too. There is quite a bit of wax on the sides and leftover wax once it burns right to the bottom. Not sure if I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: I got a bad candle with my last order.
customer_reviews.text: One of my candles burned uneasily and left lots of wax all along the glass jar, so it was wasted, and I didn’t get as much burn time with one of them. It was wasted. I have had these candles many times, but this one was defective for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Prybor

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice, but they don’t look good if you expect to gift them.
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, but top of candle is not consistently smooth. I’ve been buying them to give as gifts, but can’t because the wax on top keeps arriving all bumpy or with popped air holes that make them look low quality. It’s ok if you just use at home, but not ok if you want to give as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Female Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3/4’s of a candle
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 6 and each one of them ran out of wick 3/4’s of the way through the candle and burned in the center leaving tons of wax to be thrown out. Smell was decent. Would not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Zack Kroll

customer_reviews.title: Burn clean smell great!
customer_reviews.text: The fragrance of these geranium candles is heavenly. A clean fresh scent!! I love them they are my new favorite. Wish they lasted longer!
customer_reviews.author: terra

customer_reviews.title: Meyers candles are the bomb
customer_reviews.text: Smells so good and you have a nice jar when u are done biting the candle. I love of of the Meyers line !!!
customer_reviews.author: Good Earth

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Unacceptable for the price. This candle cost almost $10. For the price, this candle needs to burn all the product and not what is illustrated in my photo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great scent masks smell
customer_reviews.text: Candles burns easily, masks smells. I have a very small nyc apartment so whatever I’m cooking you smell everywhere. I lit this candle about 4 times a week for an hour or so. Lasted a couple months months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, great value!
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing great value, you can spend all day just sniffing the unlit candle.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These candles are great, this is our number #1 brand- we use almost every product in our home! They all smell great
customer_reviews.author: taylor

customer_reviews.title: Weird packaging situation
customer_reviews.text: The kids on my candles were loose and there were indentations/ punctures in the wax :/
customer_reviews.author: tamar

customer_reviews.title: You can not use the candle all the way it’s waisted !!
customer_reviews.text: I like the scent but unfortunately half of the candle is waisted !
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: One of the two i ordered, the glass was broken. The product smells nice and I will buy again. The 3 stars is for poor delivery
customer_reviews.author: jk schneider

customer_reviews.title: Lovely scent - burns uneven
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this scent!!! Only down side is the way it burns, too much wax left unused.
customer_reviews.author: M. Char

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful scent and safe candle
customer_reviews.text: I always order meyers candles. The socks and wax are safe
customer_reviews.author: jlw

customer_reviews.title: Smokeless candle
customer_reviews.text: Love the geranium scent and the price of these smokeless candles.
customer_reviews.author: Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Great Scent & Long Life
customer_reviews.text: Mrs. Meyer’s candles are my favorite. Scent is wonderful and candle lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Strong scent. They smell great and I like the price
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: They smell so good!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite candles. The Geranium scent is lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Corinth77

customer_reviews.title: broken jar
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the smell but unfortunately the jar came broken and can't use it. It definitely needs a better packaging, as there were no wrapping bubbles or anything inside the box.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Minea

customer_reviews.title: Smells terrific
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful smell! However the candle only burns through the middle of the jar, therefore burns more quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Wick burns out before candle is used up
customer_reviews.text: The works on both of my candles burn down when there was 1/2-3/4 inch of candle wax left. Great smell, but poor value for the money and misleading claim about total hours per candle.
customer_reviews.author: dawn parker

customer_reviews.title: Broken in Packaging
customer_reviews.text: Love these candles! But this was the second attempt to deliver a set of two candles and both time I received them with 1 broken candle. Please review your packaging of glass goods!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Clean strong smell but not overwhelming and irritating to the senses, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Merryman

customer_reviews.title: Smells good, but doesn’t burn well
customer_reviews.text: This candle does not burn properly. Wick is not thick enough for candle diameter and so the candle does not burn down evenly.
customer_reviews.author: JaynaW

customer_reviews.title: Smells fresh
customer_reviews.text: Too bad one broke in transit :(. I love mrs Meyers products
customer_reviews.author: HappyZ

customer_reviews.title: Smells incredible!
customer_reviews.text: Smells incredible! Emits just enough scent for a large room. Wish they made a body spray in this flavor!
customer_reviews.author: JD King

product_meta.title: Mrs. Meyer's Clean Day Scented Soy Aromatherapy Candle, 35 Hour Burn Time, Made with Soy Wax, Geranium, 7.2 oz- Pack of 2
product_meta.description: Style:GeraniumSometimes it feels good just to have a nice candle giving off some extra fragrance while you're busy with your chores. A Mrs. Meyer's Clean Day Geranium Candle can help you do exactly that. Let the relaxing, wonderfully soothing floral scent fill your room. Geraniums, so bold & cheery to see, and clearly quite rosy to smell. This soy candle is an easy and elegant protector of any front porch. So nice to have on hand! The cute recyclable glass candle jar makes it a great gift idea as well. All candles are made from vegetable, cottonseed and soy wax. The lead-free cotton candle wick has a 35-hour burn time and provides garden fresh fragrance while you clean or relax at home. Also available in other garden inspired scents and products such as body lotions, laundry detergents, bar soaps, and so much more! Mrs. Meyer’s – rooted in goodness.
feature_bullets: Candle made from renewable ingredients like soy wax and vegetable wax
Nonmetal, lead-free, long burning candle wick burns for 35 hours for a long-lasting Geranium scent
Comes in a recyclable glass candle jar - makes for an easy gift
Garden-fresh Geraniums, so bold & cheery to see, and clearly quite rosy to smell
Mrs. Meyer's produces cruelty free candles. None of our products are tested on animals.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
